title: authentication
description: Implemented user authentication using JWT and OAuth, enabling secure access to protected routes and resources in a Node.js application.

title: RESTful API Development
description: Designed and developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, facilitating seamless communication between the frontend and backend of web applications.

title: Database Integration
description: Integrated MongoDB with Node.js applications using Mongoose, enabling efficient data storage and retrieval for dynamic web applications.
